meanings.meaning: 2. best これは東京一のインドレストランです。This is the best Indian restaurant anywhere in Tokyo.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

5. a (single); one (of many) before a noun
6. ace Card games, See also エース
7. bottom string (on a shamisen, etc.)

meanings.meaning: 1. one １つが通り過ぎたかと思うと、すぐに次の台風が接近する。No sooner has one typhoon passed than the next one approaches.
2. for one thing often used in itemized lists一つには、私は貧しいし、それにまた忙しくもある。For one thing, I am poor; for another, I am busy.
3. only after a noun
4. (not) even with a verb in negative form妻の死の知らせを聞いてもまゆ一つ動かさなかった。He did not even raise an eyebrow at the news of his wife's death.
5. just (e.g. "just try it")

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 6. some kind of; one type of
１つ 【ひとつ】、一 【ひとつ】

1. a little; a bit; slightly Usually written using kana aloneこの机は私にはちょっと低い。This desk is a little low for me.
2. just a minute; for a moment; briefly Usually written using kana aloneネクタイを締める間、ちょっとじっとしてね。Hold still a moment while I fix your tie.
3. somewhat; rather; fairly; pretty; quite Usually written using kana alone
5. hey!; come on; excuse me Usually written using kana aloneちょっと、そこのきみ！Hey, you there!
6. thanks, but no; not feasible; not possible Usually written using kana alone

meanings.meaning: 1. one day 私は、月・水・金と一日おきに仕事をします。I work every other day: Monday, Wednesday, and Friday.
2. all day (long); the whole day; from morning till night Only applies to いちにち, See also 一日中私のｅ—ｍａｉｌアドレスは４月１日より下記になります。My e-mail address will be as follows effective April 1.
3. 1st day of the month See also １日 ついたち
一日 【いちじつ】、１日 【いちにち】、１日 【いちじつ】
1. one day 私は、月・水・金と一日おきに仕事をします。I work every other day: Monday, Wednesday, and Friday.
2. all day (long); the whole day; from morning till night Only applies to いちにち, See also 一日中私のｅ—ｍａｉｌアドレスは４月１日より下記になります。My e-mail address will be as follows effective April 1.
3. 1st day of the month See also １日 ついたち
一日 【いちじつ】、１日 【いちにち】、１日 【いちじつ】

sentences.translation: I work every other day: Monday, Wednesday, and Friday.
My e-mail address will be as follows effective April 1.

meanings.meaning: 1. one (esp. of two); the other; one way; the other way; one direction; the other direction; one side; the other side; one party; the other party 床は緑色に塗られていたが、一方壁は黄色だった。The floor was painted green, while the walls were yellow.
2. on the one hand; on the other hand See also 他方しかし、その一方、ラテン語はそのときまでに「死語」となっていた。But, then again, Latin was already a "dead language" by that time.
3. whereas; although; but at the same time; meanwhile; in turn

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix, Adverb (fukushi)
meanings.meaning: 4. just keeps; being inclined to ...; tending to be ...; tending to do ...; continuously ...; just keeps on ...ing; only after noun, adjective-stem or plain verb本屋で英語関係の本を見つけると、次々に買ってしまって、読まずにいるので、たまる一方です。I always buy the English-language books I come across at bookstores. But since I never read them, all they do is pile up.
5. Ippou

2. on the one hand; on the other hand See also 他方しかし、その一方、ラテン語はそのときまでに「死語」となっていた。But, then again, Latin was already a "dead language" by that time.
3. whereas; although; but at the same time; meanwhile; in turn

But since I never read them, all they do is pile up.

sentences.translation: The floor was painted green, while the walls were yellow.
But, then again, Latin was already a "dead language" by that time.
I always buy the English-language books I come across at bookstores. But since I never read them, all they do is pile up.

meanings.meaning: 1. (what) the heck; (why) in the world; (who) on earth before an interrogative, forms an emphatic question一体どこで彼に会ったんだ。Where on earth did you meet him?
2. one object; one body; unity ストライキとは従業員の集団が一体となって就労を拒否することです。A strike is a mass refusal to work by a body of employees.
3. one form; one style
4. one Buddhist image (or carving, etc.)
5. generally; in general See also 一体に
1. (what) the heck; (why) in the world; (who) on earth before an interrogative, forms an emphatic question一体どこで彼に会ったんだ。Where on earth did you meet him?
2. one object; one body; unity ストライキとは従業員の集団が一体となって就労を拒否することです。A strike is a mass refusal to work by a body of employees.
3. one form; one style
4. one Buddhist image (or carving, etc.)
5. generally; in general See also 一体に

sentences.translation: Where on earth did you meet him?
A strike is a mass refusal to work by a body of employees.
